ayahs.text: Hm^
tanziylu {lokita`bi mina {ll~ahi {loEaziyzi {loHakiymi
maA xalaqonaA {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa wamaA bayonahumaA^ <il~aA bi{loHaq~i wa>ajalK m~usam~FY wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ Eam~aA^ >un*iruwA@ muEoriDuwna

qulo >ara'ayotum m~aA tadoEuwna min duwni {ll~ahi >aruwniY maA*aA xalaquwA@ mina {lo>aroDi >amo lahumo $irokN fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti {}otuwniY bikita`bK m~in qaboli ha`*aA^ >awo >ava`rapK m~ino EilomK <in kuntumo Sa`diqiyna
wamano >aDal~u mim~an yadoEuwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi man l~aA yasotajiybu lahu,^ <ilaY` yawomi {loqiya`mapi wahumo Ean duEaA^}ihimo ga`filuwna
wa<i*aA Hu$ira {ln~aAsu kaAnuwA@ lahumo >aEodaA^'F wakaAnuwA@ biEibaAdatihimo ka`firiyna
wa<i*aA tutolaY` Ealayohimo 'aAya`tunaA bay~ina`tK qaAla {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ liloHaq~i lam~aA jaA^'ahumo ha`*aA siHorN m~ubiynN

>amo yaquwluwna {fotaraY`hu qulo <ini {fotarayotuhu, falaA tamolikuwna liY mina {ll~ahi $ayo_#FA huwa >aEolamu bimaA tufiyDuwna fiyhi kafaY` bihi. $ahiydF[A bayoniY wabayonakumo wahuwa {logafuwru {lr~aHiymu
qulo maA kuntu bidoEFA m~ina {lr~usuli wamaA^ >adoriY maA yufoEalu biY walaA bikumo <ino >at~abiEu <il~aA maA yuwHaY`^ <ilaY~a wamaA^ >anaA" <il~aA na*iyrN m~ubiynN

qulo >ara'ayotumo <in kaAna mino Eindi {ll~ahi wakafarotum bihi. wa$ahida $aAhidN m~in[ baniY^ <isora`^'iyla EalaY` mivolihi. fa_#aAmana wa{sotakobarotumo <in~a {ll~aha laA yahodiY {loqawoma {lZ~a`limiyna
waqaAla {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ lil~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ lawo kaAna xayorFA m~aA sabaquwnaA^ <ilayohi wa<i*o lamo yahotaduwA@ bihi. fasayaquwluwna ha`*aA^ <ifokN qadiymN
wamin qabolihi. kita`bu muwsaY`^ <imaAmFA waraHomapF waha`*aA kita`bN m~uSad~iqN l~isaAnFA Earabiy~FA l~iyun*ira {l~a*iyna ZalamuwA@ wabu$oraY` lilomuHosiniyna
<in~a {l~a*iyna qaAluwA@ rab~unaA {ll~ahu vum~a {sotaqa`muwA@ falaA xawofN Ealayohimo walaA humo yaHozanuwna
>uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {lojan~api xa`lidiyna fiyhaA jazaA^'F[ bimaA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna

wawaS~ayonaA {lo<insa`na biwa`lidayohi <iHosa`nFA Hamalatohu >um~uhu, kurohFA wawaDaEatohu kurohFA waHamoluhu, wafiSa`luhu, vala`vuwna $ahorFA Hat~aY`^ <i*aA balaga >a$ud~ahu, wabalaga >arobaEiyna sanapF qaAla rab~i >awoziEoniY^ >ano >a$okura niEomataka {l~atiY^ >anoEamota EalaY~a waEalaY` wa`lidaY~a wa>ano >aEomala Sa`liHFA taroDaY`hu wa>aSoliHo liY fiY *ur~iy~atiY^ <in~iY tubotu <ilayoka wa<in~iY mina {lomusolimiyna
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna nataqab~alu Eanohumo >aHosana maA EamiluwA@ wanatajaAwazu Ean say~i_#aAtihimo fiY^ >aSoHa`bi {lojan~api waEoda {lS~idoqi {l~a*iY kaAnuwA@ yuwEaduwna

wa{l~a*iY qaAla liwa`lidayohi >uf~K l~akumaA^ >ataEidaAniniY^ >ano >uxoraja waqado xalati {loquruwnu min qaboliY wahumaA yasotagiyvaAni {ll~aha wayolaka 'aAmino <in~a waEoda {ll~ahi Haq~N fayaquwlu maA ha`*aA^ <il~aA^ >asa`Tiyru {lo>aw~aliyna
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna Haq~a Ealayohimu {loqawolu fiY^ >umamK qado xalato min qabolihim m~ina {lojin~i wa{lo<insi <in~ahumo kaAnuwA@ xa`siriyna
walikul~K daraja`tN m~im~aA EamiluwA@ waliyuwaf~iyahumo >aEoma`lahumo wahumo laA yuZolamuwna

wayawoma yuEoraDu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ EalaY {ln~aAri >a*ohabotumo Tay~iba`tikumo fiY HayaAtikumu {ld~unoyaA wa{sotamotaEotum bihaA fa{loyawoma tujozawona Ea*aAba {lohuwni bimaA kuntumo tasotakobiruwna fiY {lo>aroDi bigayori {loHaq~i wabimaA kuntumo tafosuquwna

wa{*okuro >axaA EaAdK <i*o >an*ara qawomahu, bi{lo>aHoqaAfi waqado xalati {ln~u*uru min[ bayoni yadayohi wamino xalofihi.^ >al~aA taEobuduw^A@ <il~aA {ll~aha <in~iY^ >axaAfu Ealayokumo Ea*aAba yawomK EaZiymK
qaAluw^A@ >aji}otanaA lita>ofikanaA Eano 'aAlihatinaA fa>otinaA bimaA taEidunaA^ <in kunta mina {lS~a`diqiyna
qaAla <in~amaA {loEilomu Einda {ll~ahi wa>ubal~igukum m~aA^ >urosilotu bihi. wala`kin~iY^ >araY`kumo qawomFA tajohaluwna
falam~aA ra>awohu EaAriDFA m~usotaqobila >awodiyatihimo qaAluwA@ ha`*aA EaAriDN m~umoTirunaA balo huwa maA {sotaEojalotum bihi. riyHN fiyhaA Ea*aAbN >aliymN
tudam~iru kul~a $aYo'K] bi>amori rab~ihaA fa>aSobaHuwA@ laA yuraY`^ <il~aA masa`kinuhumo ka*a`lika najoziY {loqawoma {lomujorimiyna

walaqado mak~an~a`humo fiymaA^ <in m~ak~an~a`kumo fiyhi wajaEalonaA lahumo samoEFA wa>aboSa`rFA wa>afo_#idapF famaA^ >agonaY` Eanohumo samoEuhumo walaA^ >aboSa`ruhumo walaA^ >afo_#idatuhum m~in $aYo'K <i*o kaAnuwA@ yajoHaduwna bi_#aAya`ti {ll~ahi waHaAqa bihim m~aA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yasotahozi'uwna
walaqado >aholakonaA maA Hawolakum m~ina {loquraY` waSar~afonaA {lo'aAya`ti laEal~ahumo yarojiEuwna
falawolaA naSarahumu {l~a*iyna {t~axa*uwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi qurobaAnFA 'aAlihapF[ balo Dal~uwA@ Eanohumo wa*a`lika <ifokuhumo wamaA kaAnuwA@ yafotaruwna
wa<i*o SarafonaA^ <ilayoka nafarFA m~ina {lojin~i yasotamiEuwna {loquro'aAna falam~aA HaDaruwhu qaAluw^A@ >anSituwA@ falam~aA quDiYa wal~awoA@ <ilaY` qawomihim m~un*iriyna
qaAluwA@ ya`qawomanaA^ <in~aA samiEonaA kita`bFA >unzila min[ baEodi muwsaY` muSad~iqFA l~imaA bayona yadayohi yahodiY^ <ilaY {loHaq~i wa<ilaY` TariyqK m~usotaqiymK
ya`qawomanaA^ >ajiybuwA@ daAEiYa {ll~ahi wa'aAminuwA@ bihi. yagofiro lakum m~in *unuwbikumo wayujirokum m~ino Ea*aAbK >aliymK
waman l~aA yujibo daAEiYa {ll~ahi falayosa bimuEojizK fiY {lo>aroDi walayosa lahu, min duwnihi.^ >awoliyaA^'u >uw@la`^}ika fiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK
>awalamo yarawoA@ >an~a {ll~aha {l~a*iY xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa walamo yaEoYa bixaloqihin~a biqa`dirK EalaY`^ >an yuHo.iYa {lomawotaY` balaY`^ <in~ahu, EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN
wayawoma yuEoraDu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ EalaY {ln~aAri >alayosa ha`*aA bi{loHaq~i qaAluwA@ balaY` warab~inaA qaAla fa*uwquwA@ {loEa*aAba bimaA kuntumo takofuruwna

fa{Sobiro kamaA Sabara >uw@luwA@ {loEazomi mina {lr~usuli walaA tasotaEojil l~ahumo ka>an~ahumo yawoma yarawona maA yuwEaduwna lamo yalobavuw^A@ <il~aA saAEapF m~in n~ahaArK] bala`gN fahalo yuholaku <il~aA {loqawomu {lofa`siquwna
